itemDescription: British water polo player and coach

wikipedia_page.main:
Angela Winstanley-Smith (born 5 August 1985) is a British water polo player, and coach.
She competed for Great Britain in the women's tournament in the
2012 Summer Olympics. This was the first ever Olympic GB women's water polo team. She competed at the 2013 World Aquatics Championships.She is the head coach of the New Zealand Women's Water Polo team, at the 2017 World Aquatics Championships.
She was appointed after taking the Marist Magic to back to back New Zealand titles. This included an undefeated season in 2016.
